title: Eden's Serum
description: Adam has almost everything he could possibly want. He’s an up-and-coming corporate president with his own division in a successful tech company. Adam’s also one of the few people on the planet who can afford to buy what everyone wants: Immortality.Taking Eden’s Serum guarantees that Adam will live forever. But is it all that it has been advertised?Adam’s new assistant, Evelyn, is an enigma who is determined to help him. When people are murdered, Adam and Evelyn set out to solve the mystery of Eden’s Serum. But will it be too late for Adam?A Cybertech thrill ride that takes you into a shocking future, Eden’s Serum is the first book of the Eden series.
author: Angelique S. Anderson
